data.text: @hirshad__ Yaa also missed one year due to sandpaper
@StrawHatRoY21 @hirshad__ In mid 2000s early 2010s that's correct. Not in 1990s or early 2000s which is when his 90+ matches was played.

@hirshad__ Correct hain ..but you missed mentioning he missed out year due to that Sand Paper issue 😂😂😂😂…..
Behen ke ❤️de Sachin sabka ka baap hain 😅😂😂😂😂😂 …tu jaake ghar pe bomb banana seekh 😂😂😂😂😂
@hirshad__ Let him play 150 tests first then we will talk
@ErenKru139 @keitathegoat8 @hirshad__ plus dravid and tendulkar incidents which were technically not proven but very credible too id say

@ErenKru139 @keitathegoat8 @hirshad__ i have no concrete evidence. just acusations and my word for it. 2015 sanga's last game at P Sara Oval I was there and rahane and binny were both using sweets on the boundary.
@hirshad__ Smith didn't miss much cricket from COVID, only a Test tour to SA got cancelled last year
